title: Huge Lag since client update
body:
Today I had a client update after patch 6.12. Ever since then, I've been experiencing huge lag spikes with FPS plummeting down to 5. I have fiberoptic internet and no other applications have been slow to load, so I don't think it's my internet, and I have never experienced lag/fps spikes like this - or really any, to speak of. 

I am doing a client repair and will restart my computer after, but is anyone else having this problem? I've not seen a red post or notification indicating it has been acknowledged as a widely occurring issue.

replies.body:
I went ahead and double-checked and we aren't seeing any server-wide reports of drastically increased lag.  Unfortunately, drastic FPS drops and Lag spikes have very similar symptoms to each other, so its a bit hard to clearly identify as to whether it is a connection issue or a FPS issue.  In an effort to narrow it down, make sure to use our [Connection Analyzer Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader).  It'll take a health check of your connection and provide solutions if it detects any problems.

Feel free to reply back and let me know if the issues persist!
Thanks for the response. It appears the issue was resolved with a client repair. Something must have bugged out when I downloaded the update.
